name: Gesture and Motion Signal File
summary: Learn about .GMS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The GMS format stores only the minimal features needed to represent movement and gesture information. These include flexible dimensionality for movements, encoded variables, versatile structuration, and spatial and temporal properties.
GMS files are supported by the LibGMS library.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
